title: Sales & Production Coordinator – Client & Vendor Relations Expert
description:
Sales & Production Coordinator – Client & Vendor Relations Expert



Company: STX Promo | 
 



Location: Remote (Philippines-based) 



Work Hours: Full-Time, U.S. Day Shift (Philippine Overnight) + Light weekend inbox rotation 

Pay Range: $1,100–$1,500/month (Includes premium pay for U.S. hours / Night Shift. Starting rate depends on experience and operational expertise).





???? About STX Promo & Our Growth:



STX Promo helps businesses and organizations Step Up Their Setup with eye-catching custom canopies, table covers, flags, banners, and more. We work with small businesses, schools, and nonprofits across the U.S. to elevate their brand presence at events and trade shows.



We are growing incredibly fast. Over the last 10 months alone, we’ve added 4 people to our core team along with several specialized gig workers. As we gear up for our busiest season yet, our current Sales and Production Coordinator is handling a massive volume of orders. We are actively hiring a second full-time coordinator to jump into the trenches, split the workload, and help us maintain our pro-level communication and zero-hassle client experience.





???? About the Role: Your Impact:



We are looking for a heavy hitter. We need a highly organized, proactive Sales & Production Coordinator who specializes in Client and Vendor Relations and Process Optimization.



In this role, you are the crucial bridge between our U.S. clients, our internal design team, and our manufacturing suppliers. Because we are growing so quickly, our backend operations need to evolve. We are looking for someone who brings strong operational insights to the table—someone who can look at how we currently do things, identify bottlenecks, and help us build more efficient, error-proof workflows.





Key Responsibilities:



Workflow Optimization: Actively analyze and improve our backend processes. Bring fresh ideas to the table on how to best utilize ClickUp, Shopify, and Gmail to maximize our team's efficiency and minimize costly mistakes.



Client Relations: Manage daily incoming sales and customer service
s (via Gmail) and handle live chat inquiries, utilizing AI tools (ChatGPT/Gemini) to draft efficient, professional responses.



Vendor Management: Place precise orders through various supplier portals. Proactively follow up on order statuses, track estimated delivery times, and troubleshoot any delays directly with vendors.



Production Coordination: Collaborate heavily with our Graphic Design team. You will confirm print graphics with clients, ensure mockups align with expectations, and prepare final files for supplier handoff.



Workflow Tracking: Organize and communicate project priorities using ClickUp to track progress and strict deadlines. Maintain organized client files within Google Drive.



Team Sync: Communicate efficiently with the internal team on a daily basis via WhatsApp.



Schedule & Light Weekend Rotation: Work a consistent Monday–Friday U.S. daytime schedule. You won't have to work every weekend. You will split a light weekend inbox rotation with our current coordinator (e.g., alternating weekends or splitting Saturday/Sunday). This is just a quick check-in to ensure clients aren't left hanging. Many clients shop around on weekends—by replying quickly while our competitors wait until Monday, we win the deal!





? You're a Great Fit If You Have:



Top-Tier English & US Culture Match: Proven experience working directly with a U.S.-based company. You must possess a strong understanding of American business communication, tone, and customer expectations. (This is a massive differentiator for us—your English must be impeccable).



Operational Mindset: You aren't just an order-taker; you are a problem solver who naturally looks for ways to make systems run smoother and faster.



Vendor/Client Experience: A solid background in managing supplier relationships and keeping clients happy, especially when dealing with physical products and shipping deadlines.



Extreme Attention to Detail: One wrong measurement or file upload can ruin a print job. You must be hyper-vigilant when approving graphics and placing orders.



Grace Under Pressure: You thrive in a fast-paced environment, can juggle multiple priorities at once, and keep your cool during the "busy season."



Reliability: A stable internet connection and a concrete backup plan for power or internet outages.





? Bonus Points If You Also Have:



Prior experience or understanding of the promotional products industry, large-format printing, or design files (e.g., bleed, CMYK, vectors).



Hands-on experience managing orders within Shopify.





???? How to Apply (Please Read Carefully):



Attention to detail starts here. To ensure your application stands out, please submit the following:

Your updated Resume/CV.



A short written note answering these three questions:



What specific experience do you have managing US-based clients and interacting with third-party vendors/suppliers?



Have you ever worked with print or design files before? If so, please briefly describe your experience.



Why do you believe you would truly thrive in this fast-paced, high-volume role, and how do you approach making workflows more efficient?



(Note: If your application is shortlisted, Step 2 of our interview process will be to submit a quick 2-minute video or voice intro so we can get to know you better!)



Applications missing any of the requirements above will be automatically filtered out and will not be reviewed. We look forward to reviewing your application and finding the next crucial member of our growing team!

title: Patient Care Coordinator
description:
We are an innovative health tech company specializing in the development of a cutting-edge nutrition app. Our app leverages personalized data, including physical conditions, genetic components, and more to create tailored diets, nutritional plans, and recipes. Designed to support patients at the highest level of care, our platform empowers users to achieve optimal health outcomes through science-backed personalization.



We’re seeking a proactive and motivated Patient Care Coordinator to join our team urgently. In this key position, you’ll play a vital role in ensuring the success of our users and patients by coordinating their journey through our app. If you’re someone who takes initiative, thrives in a fast-paced environment, and is passionate about health and technology, this is your opportunity to make a real impact.



Key Responsibilities:



-Manage the onboarding process for new users and patients, guiding them through setup and initial use of the app.

-Monitor and document user experiences, including any challenges, troubleshooting issues, and feedback.

-Relay critical insights and data to the leadership and development team to drive continuous app improvements and enhancements.

-Coordinate communication between users, patients, and internal stakeholders to ensure smooth operations and high satisfaction.

-Proactively identify opportunities to optimize user success and contribute ideas for app features based on real-world interactions.



Qualifications and Skills:



-Excellent command of English, both written and verbal – clear communication is essential.

-Strong organizational skills with a keen eye for detail and the ability to keep accurate notes and records.

-Self-motivated and initiative-driven; we need someone who isn’t afraid to roll up their sleeves and get things done.

-Experience in customer service, patient coordination, or a similar role in health/tech is a plus, but enthusiasm and a quick learning curve are key.

-Familiarity with nutrition, wellness apps, or digital health tools is advantageous but not required.

-Ability to work independently while being a collaborative team player.



How to Apply:

Change the Subject Line to: "Patient Care Coordinator – [Your Name] "

Send your resume and any relevant portfolio samples to:

d a t . v a 1 1 4 8 at g`m`a`i`l . c o m (remove spaces)



We look forward to reviewing your application and exploring how your skills can contribute to our team!



Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

title: Creative Graphic & Brand Designer – Fast-Growing US Team (Full-Time Hours Available!)
description:
Creative Graphic & Brand Designer – Fast-Growing US Team (Full-Time Hours Available!)



Company: STX Promo | 
 



Location: Remote (Philippines-based) Work Hours: U.S. Day Shift (Flexible, see below!) 



Pay: $6.00/hour (With the ability to work 40+ hours a week)





???? About STX Promo & Our Explosive Growth:



STX Promo helps businesses and organizations Step Up Their Setup with eye-catching custom canopies, table covers, flags, banners, tradeshow setups and more.



We are growing at a massive pace. To give you an idea: we hired a new graphic designer just 3 weeks ago, and our order volume is so high that we already need to hire another one! Our last two design hires started at 4 hours a day, and within two weeks, they were working 6–8+ hours a day.



Bottom line: If you are hungry for work and want consistent, reliable hours, we have as much work as you can handle.





???? About the Role: Your Impact:



We need a visionary Graphic Designer who is highly creative, technically precise, and savvy with the latest AI design tools.

At STX Promo, we don’t just print logos; we help brands stand out at their biggest events. We need a designer with a "good eye" for premium aesthetics who can take a client's rough idea and turn it into a high-impact display.





Key Responsibilities:



Creative Layouts: Develop eye-catching, professional layouts for canopies, banners, flags, table covers, and apparel.



Ad Creative: Generate high-converting static image ads for Meta 
/Instagram) and Google.



Vector Excellence: Recreate logos into clean, high-quality vector files. (Note: We use Vector AI tools to speed this up, but you must have the manual Adobe Illustrator skills to clean up and perfect the final output).



AI Integration: Use tools like Nano Banana, Midjourney, etc., to generate and edit high-quality visual assets. You should be comfortable with prompt engineering.



Print Readiness: Ensure all files are technically perfect and formatted correctly for large-format printing.



Team Sync: Collaborate daily with our Sales and Production Coordinators via ClickUp,
, and WhatsApp.





? You're a Great Fit If You Have:



A Creative Eye: You understand layout, typography, and color; you know how to make a design look "expensive" and professional.



Software Mastery: Expert-level proficiency in Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop.



Vector Skills: Ability to manually recreate almost any logo from a low-quality image into a crisp vector when AI tools fall short.



AI Savvy: Experience using AI design tools and the ability to write effective prompts.



Fluent English: Excellent communication skills to coordinate with our US-based team.





???? How to Apply (Please Read Carefully):



To show us you’re the right fit, please submit the following. Applications missing a portfolio will be immediately deleted.



Your Portfolio: You MUST include examples of:



Your best creative layouts/marketing designs.



Static image ads (Social Media/Google).



Before & After examples of your vector conversions.



A short written note answering these two questions:



Briefly describe your experience preparing files for large-format printing or apparel.



Are you looking to eventually scale up to 6–8+ hours a day, and are you comfortable working U.S. Daytime hours?



(Note: If your portfolio blows us away, Step 2 of our interview process will be to submit a quick 2-minute video or voice intro so we can get to know you better!)



We look forward to reviewing your portfolio and finding the next creative powerhouse for our team!

title: Amazon FBA Seller Central Marketing Analyst / Manager / Specialist
description:
Amazon FBA Seller Central Marketing Analyst / Manager / Specialist



+4 Years Amazon Experience Required



This is a unique opportunity for an organized and entrepreneurially-minded Amazon Manager to join our team and help operate and grow startup and household name client brands. As an Amazon Manager, you will be ideating and executing growth strategies while optimizing the Amazon presence of our rapidly growing portfolio of client products and brands.



This is a full time remote role.



What you’ll be doing:



Playing an integral role in designing and building a best-in-class Amazon presence for a set of companies from our diverse brand portfolio.



Creating and continually optimizing listings, as well as troubleshooting and fixing issues as they arise.



Developing marketing strategies across our portfolio of brands, and coordinating with stakeholders as needed to execute.



Managing promotions (coupons, deals) and PPC advertising campaigns.



Analyzing Amazon data (sales, conversation rate, sessions, etc.) to determine why certain products are trending up or down and developing strategies to increase conversions and sales.



Resolving issues that come up (listing take downs, content not publishing, catalog errors, etc.) and escalating to internal stakeholders as needed.



Developing and maintaining a professional knowledge of new or emerging trends within the Amazon and online shopping space. You’ll constantly research opportunities for improvement to drive traffic and conversion growth.





Attending weekly meetings to communicate needs and resolve issues.





Your profile / Must Have:



In-depth knowledge of Amazon Seller Central and FBA processes. +4 Years experience with a track record of success.

Comprehensive understanding of Amazon and Seller Central, best practices, along with policies and guidelines. Flat file expert.



Proven experience as an Amazon Virtual Assistant or in a similar role.

Experience in Amazon detail page optimization, listing management, SEO marketing, and PPC

Excellent organizational and analytical skills, as well as a hands-on mentality.

Excellent communications and customer service skills

Excellent English (speaking and writing)

Creative thinker



Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and make informed decisions. Top notch problem solving skills.



Attention to detail. Self-motivated and able to work independently.

Good with Excel, Google Sheets, and formulas

Proficient in using Google Drive for collaborative tasks.





Nice to Have



Experience with graphic design / photoshop or similar software



Experience with social media marketing



Experience with Walmart Seller Central





About us

We are a full-service agency that works with brands and manufactures to grow their sales and profit on Amazon both in the US and globally. Additionally, we own a handful of private label brands that we own and operate ourselves.

This is a remote position, and candidates from all locations are welcome to apply. We offer flexible working hours and opportunities for professional growth within our organization.



To apply, please submit your resume and a cover letter outlining your relevant experience and why you are interested in this position. We look forward to reviewing your application!

title: Full-Time Remote Administrative & CRM Assistant (Growth Role)
description:
Work Schedule

Monday–Friday     8:00 AM – 5:00 PM EST    Two 30-minute breaks daily

Full availability required during working hours

No other jobs during this time



How This Role Will Start



You will begin with clearly defined projects such as:



Importing and cleaning our CRM (GoHighLevel)



Removing duplicates and organizing contact records



Tagging customers by service type and year



Building segmented customer lists



Drafting
 campaigns and automation sequences



Creating 30+
 post drafts



Organizing property management and building contact lists



Training will be provided through recorded screen-share videos and written instructions.



GoHighLevel training resources will also be available. (but experience preferred)



How This Role Will Grow



As you demonstrate reliability and attention to detail, responsibilities will expand to include:



Answering inbound customer calls



Calling parts departments to check availability 



general research tasks for owner



Scheduling service appointments



Managing CRM pipelines and automations



Monitoring campaign performance



Attending GoHighLevel training sessions and business meetings on behalf of the owner



Taking organized notes and summarizing key takeaways



Assisting in implementing what is learned from those meetings



If workload increases, the role may eventually be divided into two separate positions (CRM/Marketing and Phone/Scheduling). Strong performers will have opportunity for increased responsibility and compensation.



Requirements



Strong written and spoken English



Professional and confident phone presence (or willingness to develop it)



Highly organized and detail-oriented



Comfortable learning new systems



Able to attend online meetings and summarize clearly



CRM experience preferred (GoHighLevel a plus)



Reliable high-speed internet



Quiet, professional workspace



Willing to use time tracking software during work hours



Accountability



Daily end-of-day summary required



Weekly progress reports



Time tracking during work hours



Long-term commitment expected



To Apply



Please answer:



What CRM systems have you used?



Have you built
 automations before?



Are you comfortable answering phone calls?



Have you attended meetings on behalf of a manager and taken notes?



What is your internet speed?



Why are you interested in a long-term growth role?



Include the word “STRUCTURE” at the top of your application.

title: Tech Savvy Personal and Marketing Assistant
description:
We are seeking a highly organized, tech-savvy Personal Assistant & Video Ads Specialist with strong digital marketing and real estate operations experience to support a busy real estate investor and technology professional. This role specifically requires someone who can research, plan, and produce high-converting video advertisements — not just static graphics. This hybrid position combines executive assistance, marketing execution, and performance-focused content creation.



Core Responsibilities



Manage calendars, inboxes, travel coordination, and administrative workflows



Handle confidential executive and personal assistant tasks



Conduct competitor research, market analysis, and industry trend monitoring



Research target audiences and develop detailed customer and marketing personas



Support lead generation tracking and performance reporting



Manage property listings, CRM systems, and marketing automation tools



Video Advertising & Content Creation (Primary Focus)



Create, edit, and publish video ads designed for conversions and lead generation



Produce short-form and paid advertising creatives for:



TikTok Ads



Instagram &
 Reels



YouTube Shorts



Paid social media campaigns



Script, storyboard, and optimize video hooks, pacing, captions, and CTAs for viral performance



Edit videos using professional tools such as:



CapCut



Adobe Premiere Pro



After Effects



Similar advanced video editing platforms (Canva-only experience is not sufficient)



Repurpose long-form content into multiple ad variations



Continuously iterate creatives using performance data and A/B testing



Digital Marketing & Growth Support



Launch and optimize campaigns via Meta Ads Manager and Google Ads



Perform audience segmentation, funnel optimization, and SEO keyword research



Track conversions, analyze campaign metrics, and improve marketing ROI



Translate customer personas into messaging, creatives, and ad strategy



Ideal Candidate



Proven experience creating video ads that drive engagement or conversions



Strong understanding of performance marketing and social media algorithms



Comfortable owning projects from research ? creative production ? optimization



Highly proactive, analytical, detail-oriented, and execution-focused



Experience supporting entrepreneurs, executives, or real estate businesses preferred



This role is best suited for someone who understands modern attention-driven marketing and can independently create video ads that generate leads, engagement, and measurable business results.

title: Sales Internship (SDR/Cold Caller/Outbound)
description:
Company: Core Mind Technology Inc

Employment Type: Internship

Work Setup: Remote

Schedule: 9/10pm - 6/7am PST (8am - 5pm Central Time USA) {Daylight Savings Shifts the schedule 2 times per year}



About the Role

Core Mind Technology is hiring for a Sales Development Internship (SDI) to support outbound sales efforts by generating and qualifying opportunities for our Sales Representatives/Closers. This role is focused on cold outreach, appointment setting, and early-stage qualification through phone,
, and LinkedIn engagement.

The SDI plays a critical role at the top of the funnel—creating opportunities, booking qualified meetings, and ensuring a steady flow of prospects into the sales pipeline. 



This internship will last between 16 and 26 weeks. The graduation of the internship is solely based on the intern's performance and ability to complete tasks in the amount of time allocated. There is a fast tract graduation as well if the intern generates a specific amount of revenue for the company as well



Key Responsibilities

- Outbound Prospecting & Appointment Setting

- Conduct outbound calling to targeted leads

- Book qualified discovery or sales calls for Sales Representatives/Closers

- Set up an onboarding call with an interested prospect while collecting the deposit

- Engage prospects through outbound
 and LinkedIn messaging

- Respond to replies from outbound campaigns and manage follow-up conversations



Lead Qualification & Handoff

- Qualify prospects based on basic fit, interest, and readiness

- Clearly document notes, context, and next steps before passing leads to the closer

- Ensure smooth handoff of qualified opportunities to the Sales Representative



Campaign & Outreach Support

- Act as the primary point person for LinkedIn and
 reply management

- Ensure outbound campaigns are running correctly and as intended (high-level monitoring)

- Provide feedback on messaging effectiveness and lead quality



Collaboration & Process

- Coordinate closely with Sales Representatives / Closers on active opportunities

- Align daily outreach efforts with sales goals and pipeline needs

- Follow established outbound and qualification processes consistently



What We’re Looking For

- Strong desire to succeed in outbound sales, cold calling, or appointment setting

- Comfortable with outbound volume calling and direct prospect conversations

- Strong communication and rapport-building skills

- Organized with follow-ups, notes, and lead handoffs

- Self-motivated and able to work independently in a remote environment



Nice to Have

- Experience selling or prospecting for high ticket products or service/solutions based businesses (no physical product)

- Familiarity with CRMs, dialers, and outreach tools

- Experience with LinkedIn outreach and
 campaign tools



Compensation & Incentives

- Base Pay: $200 monthly salary (paid for completing required daily, weekly and monthly SDI duties and outreach activities) {interns who fail to complete 3 weeks of tasks and requirements will not qualify for base pay}

- Paid Time off for all 18 Philippines Holidays (If all SDI activities are completed or on track)

- Unlimited Paid Time Off (If all SDI activities are on track, completed or able to be reassigned) {Unless Abused}



Bonus Opportunities:

- Performance-based bonuses may be offered based on appointments booked, show rate, or revenue generated

- Training & Growth:

- Sales training, scripts, and ongoing support provided



Graduation Incentives (Assuming transition to a full time role):

- Clear growth path into Inbound Sales Representative/Closer roles after graduation (Higher Compensation)

- Company Funded Healthcare Plan

- Company Funded Macbook Air/Pro

- Company Funded Battery Back Up System (To prevent/minimize interruptions during power outages) 

- Company Funded Internet Service 



How to Apply

Please submit:

- Your resume or LinkedIn profile

- A short introduction (2–5 sentences) outlining your outbound or SDI experience

- Optional: a short voice note or video introduction

title: Sales Representative (Closer / Sales Associate – Overflow Sales)
description:
Company: Core Mind Technology

Supported Brands: Jennings Marketing Solutions, with potential support for other sister companies

Employment Type: Full-time

Work Setup: Remote

Schedule: US hours



About the Role

Core Mind Technology is hiring a Sales Representative (Closer / Sales Associate) to support inbound and outbound sales efforts across our marketing agency and related brands. This role focuses on handling qualified sales conversations, running discovery and closing calls, and moving opportunities through the pipeline with strong follow-through and documentation.

This position is ideal for a confident communicator who is comfortable leading sales conversations, qualifying prospects, and closing deals while working closely with a distributed team.



Key Responsibilities

Sales & Client Acquisition

- Handle inbound sales calls and follow up with warm and qualified leads

- Conduct outbound prospecting when needed via calls,
, and social follow-ups

- Schedule, confirm, and run discovery and sales calls

- Qualify prospects based on needs, budget, timeline, and decision-makers

- Clearly explain service offerings and value propositions

- Address objections and guide prospects toward close



Pipeline & Process Management

- Maintain accurate records of calls, notes, and outcomes in the CRM

- Ensure timely follow-ups and smooth handoff to onboarding or fulfillment teams

- Coordinate with internal tea
mbers to ensure proposals are created and delivered

- Follow the established sales process consistently



Collaboration & Communication

- Attend required sales meetings and scheduled sales calls

- Coordinate with tea
mbers on active deals and next steps

- Work with the retention and renewals workflow team to support long-term client success

- Ask for support or guidance from leadership as needed



Performance Expectations based off 20 call per week

Weeks 1 and 2:

- Learn the offer assigned and perfect your sales flow

- Target at least 60% advance to a second call if not closed

- Target 2 total closed deals in your first 2 weeks

- Performance below expectations will be supported with coaching, call reviews, and process adjustments



Weeks 3 and 4:

- Target at least 70% advance to a second call if not closed

- Target at least 2 closed deals per week (4 total)

- Learn a new offer after 20% close ratio is maintained for 2 weeks

- Performance below expectations will be supported with coaching, call reviews, and process adjustments



Weeks 5 through 8:

- Target 80% advance to a second call if not closed

- Target 3 - 5 closed deals per week

- Learn a new offer after 20% close ratio is maintained for 2 weeks on all offers trained on

- Performance below expectations will be supported with coaching, call reviews, and process adjustments



Weeks 9 through 12:

- Target 80% advance to a second call if not closed

- Target 3 - 5 total closed deals

- Learn a new offer after 20% close ratio is maintained for 2 weeks on all offers trained on

- Work with leadership to funnel the offers with higher close ratio to applicable tea
mbers.

- Performance below expectations will be supported with coaching, call reviews, and process adjustments



What We’re Looking For

- Experience in hight ticket sales, closing, appointment setting, or client acquisition

- Strong phone and zoom presence and confidence leading sales conversations

- Organized, reliable, and consistent with follow-ups

- Ability to quickly learn offers and communicate value clearly

- Comfortable suggested improvements to leadership to improve processes

- Self-driven and comfortable working remotely



Nice to Have

- Experience selling marketing services, AI systems, consulting services, and Software

- Familiarity with Close CRM, Slack, Notion, and Asana

- Experience with Zoom, Google Meet, calendars, and basic reporting



Compensation & Incentives

- Base Pay: Up to $400 monthly salary (paid for completing required daily, weekly and monthly SR duties and follow up activities) {SRs who fail to complete 3 weeks of tasks and requirements will not qualify for base pay}

- Paid Time off for all 18 Philippines Holidays (If all SDI activities are completed or on track)

- Unlimited Paid Time Off (If all SDI activities are on track, completed or able to be reassigned) {Unless Abused}



Commissions Offerings

- 10% on first month revenue closed and 3% on first months two through six of revenue collected (if client is retained)



Performance Bonus Opportunities:

- Bonuses based on retention of closed sales

- Bonuses based off number of close sales per month



Benefits after 90 days with the company:

- Company Funded Healthcare Plan

- Company Funded Macbook Air/Pro

- Company Funded Battery Back Up System (To prevent/minimize interruptions during power outages)

- Company Funded Internet Service

- Profit Share Pool Qualification



How to Apply

Please submit:

- Your resume or LinkedIn profile

- A short introduction (2–5 sentences) highlighting your sales experience

- Optional: a short voice note or video introduction

title: Real Estate Transaction Coordinator – New York
description:
We are hiring a Transaction Coordinator with real U.S. real estate transaction experience who wants to grow with the team for the next 5–10 years.

This is a transaction CONTRACT to CLOSE role. 

Must have real estate transaction experience.



9AM–5PM EST (Monday–Friday)

Immediate Start Required

Full-Time | Remote | Long-Term Role



===============

About the Role:



You will manage transactions from executed contract to closing in a fast-paced New York real estate environment.



This role requires precision, deadline control, document discipline, and proactive follow-up.



Daniel is one of the top realtors in New York. 

He moves quickly. 

He is fair. 

He does not repeat instructions.



If you need constant reminders, this is not the role for you. 

If you thrive in structure, accountability, and execution — keep reading.



===============



Your responsibilities include: 



• Contract-to-close management

• Deadline tracking (inspection, financing, appraisal, board packages)

• Attorney coordination (NYC co-op / condo processes)

• Repair negotiation tracking

• Compliance & document completeness

• Escrow and wire confirmation follow-up

• Board package oversight

• Status reporting (clear, executive-level summaries)

• Real-time responsiveness when deal risk emerges



This role requires flexibility.



NYC deals move fast and shift quickly.



While core responsibilities are outlined above, additional transaction-related tasks may arise as market conditions or deal complexity evolve.



===============



Schedule

• Monday–Friday

• 9:00 AM – 5:00 PM EST

• Immediate start required

• Long-term commitment 



===============



Compensation: Hourly rate PLUS: 

• Performance-based bonuses

• 13th Month Pay eligibility (after 12 Months) 

• Long-term stability

 

===============

Phase 1 – Required Application Questions



All candidates must complete the questions below to be considered.



Daniel is extremely busy. 

His team will evaluate submissions.

Only the top five candidates will meet with Daniel directly.

 

1. Describe your direct U.S. real estate transaction experience.



Include:

• What state(s) you supported

• Number of transactions handled monthly

• Contract-to-close responsibilities

• Software used (Skyslope, Dotloop, AppFolio, etc.)



2. High-Stress Transaction Example



Describe one transaction where a closing was at risk.

Include:

• Purchase price

• What was at risk (financial + timeline)

• What you specifically did

• The measurable outcome



3. Deadline Control Scenario



A closing is scheduled in 5 days.

You discover:

• Appraisal report not yet received

• Buyer’s lender has not confirmed final underwriting

• Inspection credit agreement not documented in writing

• Attorney has not confirmed wire instructions



Explain:

• What you do in the next 24 hours

• What you escalate immediately

• What you document



Be specific.



===============



First Line of Application



First line of your response must read exactly:

TRANSACTION COORDINATOR – I HAVE U.S. REAL ESTATE EXPERIENCE



Applications that do not follow this instruction will not be reviewed.

title: SEO & Blog Content Specialist – Part Time (Remote)
description:
Heirloom Event Company is a nationwide wedding planning team creating joyful, intentional celebrations for engaged couples.



Our mission is simple: help couples celebrate their love in a way that feels authentic to them. With more than five years in business and 200+ weddings executed across multiple markets, we are expanding our digital presence and looking to strengthen our long-term SEO and content strategy.



We are seeking a strategic, detail-oriented SEO & Blog Content Specialist to support website growth, blog development, and search optimization across multiple markets.



This is not a “just write posts” role. We are looking for someone who understands search intent, analytics, structure, and how content converts to qualified inquiries.



The SEO & Blog Content Specialist is responsible for improving Heirloom’s organic visibility through strategic blog creation, keyword optimization, and website updates.



This role supports long-term growth by ensuring our website ranks well, converts effectively, and reflects the Heirloom brand voice.



Position Type: Part Time

Location: Remote

Estimated Hours: 5–15 hours per week (scalable based on performance)



Core Responsibilities

SEO Strategy & Optimization

• Conduct keyword research aligned with wedding planning search trends

• Optimize existing blog posts 

• Implement on-page SEO best practices (headers, meta descriptions, alt text, internal linking)

• Monitor performance via Google Analytics and Google Search Console

• Provide monthly SEO performance summaries and recommendations



Blog & Content Creation

• Write SEO-optimized blog posts in the Heirloom voice

• Structure blog posts for readability and conversion

• Collaborate with owner on topic planning

• Repurpose blog content for additional platforms when appropriate



Website Management (Squarespace)

• Format and publish blog posts in Squarespace

• Update metadata and SEO settings

• Upload and optimize images

• Ensure clean internal linking across markets



REQUIREMENT: YOU MUST BE FAMILIAR WITH SQUARESPACE

title: Amazon PPC Manager
description:
Job Title: Amazon PPC Manager (Remote, Philippines)



We are hiring an Amazon PPC Manager to take ownership of paid advertising across multiple Amazon brands.



This is not a task-following role.

We are looking for someone who thinks critically, understands profitability, and can explain why performance changes — not just report numbers.



If you are someone who:

• Notices patterns in data before others do

…you may be a strong fit.

• Identify wasted spend and reallocate budgets intelligently

• Expand keywords and targeting using structured logic

• Analyze performance trends and explain root causes

• Recommend strategic changes based on profitability, not vanity metrics

• Provide short weekly summaries of what changed, why, and what’s next



What We Care About



• Clear thinking and strong logic

• Ability to explain decisions simply

• Attention to detail across multiple accounts

• Reliability and responsiveness

• Ownership mindset (not waiting to be told what to do)



Basic Requirements

• Comfortable with spreadsheets and data analysis

• Strong written English

• Stable internet and ability to work full-time remotely



To Apply

A short intro about yourself

Your PPC experience and typical account size

The biggest PPC mistake you see brands make

Expected monthly salary in USD

Availability (part time, full time, etc)

title: Supply Chain Manager
description:
Job Title: Supply Chain Manager (Women’s Fashion E-commerce)

Location: Remote

Language: English (spoken & written)



We’re a fast-growing women’s fashion e-commerce brand looking for a Supply Chain Manager who thrives on structure, accuracy, and clear communication. This role is crucial in ensuring that every single order is tracked, resolved, and fulfilled correctly, even when issues arise weeks later.



If you’re detail-obsessed, process-driven, and calm under complexity, this role is for you.



???? The Role



As Supply Chain Manager, you will be responsible for daily order tracking and issue resolution across suppliers, systems, and customer service. Many of our orders require active follow-up due to availability issues (size, color, or product availability), and your job is to make sure nothing slips through the cracks.



You will work primarily with:



ServicePoints (orders, suppliers, quotes, products)



Shopify



Internal tracking sheets & workflows



Customer Service team



???? Key Responsibilities

Order Monitoring & Tracking



Check daily orders one by one in Shopify and ServicePoints



Identify issues such as:



Product not available



Color not available



Size not available



Order still open after certain time





Issue Resolution & Customer Flow

When an issue is found, create a case for Customer Service

Maintain clear communication with Customer Service while they contact the customer

Track customer responses, even if they come weeks later

Once a solution is confirmed (e.g. new color or size):

Create a new Shopify order with correct customer details and preferences



Workflow & Process Management



Build and maintain personal workflows, sheets, and tracking systems

Use triggers, statuses, and notes to avoid confusion across multiple open cases

Ensure no order is missed, delayed, or mishandled

Continuously improve processes for clarity and scalability



Communication

Work closely with Customer Service

Keep communication structured, documented, and timely

Flag recurring supply issues proactively



???? What We’re Looking For



You are someone who:



Has experience in supply chain, order management, or operations (e-commerce preferred)



Is extremely detail-oriented and organised



Is comfortable working with:



Order management systems (like ServicePoints or similar)



Shopify



Spreadsheets & workflow tracking



Understands how easily orders can get lost without structure—and actively prevents that



Can manage many open cases at once without losing overview



Communicates clearly and professionally in English



Works independently and takes ownership



???? What We Offer



A key operational role in a growing women’s fashion brand



Remote working environment



A role with real responsibility and impact



Opportunity to build and optimise systems, not just follow them



Long-term collaboration if performance is strong



???? How to Apply



Please send:



A short motivation



Your experience with supply chain, order management, or e-commerce operations



Examples of how you stay organised when handling many cases at once



We’re looking for someone who sees complexity not as chaos—but as something to structure and master.

title: Cloud Technician – AI Infrastructure & Deploymen
description:
Cloud Technician – AI Infrastructure & Deployment



The Role



We're looking for a hands-on Cloud Technician who can bridge the gap between AI models and production-ready infrastructure. You'll be responsible for deploying AI services to cloud environments, building and maintaining the backend systems that power them, and ensuring everything runs reliably at scale. If you're someone who enjoys connecting the dots between machine learning, backend engineering, and cloud architecture, this role is for you.



 What You'll Do



- Deploy, host, and manage AI models and automation services on cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure)

- Build and maintain backend APIs and services that connect AI models to client-facing applications

- Set up and manage cloud infrastructure including servers, containers, networking, and storage

- Configure CI/CD pipelines for automated testing and deployment of AI workloads

- Monitor system performance, uptime, and costs — optimizing where needed

- Implement security best practices for cloud environments handling sensitive data

- Collaborate with our AI and development teams to architect scalable, reliable solutions

- Troubleshoot production issues and maintain documentation for all infrastructure



What We're Looking For



- Strong understanding of backend development (Python, Node.js, or similar)

- Experience deploying and serving AI/ML models in production (e.g., using Docker, Kubernetes, or serverless functions)

- Familiarity with RESTful APIs, microservices architecture, and message queues

- Working knowledge of containerization (Docker) and orchestration tools

- Experience with infrastructure-as-code tools such as Terraform, CloudFormation, or Pulumi

- Comfortable with Linux server administration and shell scripting

- Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently



Nice to Have



- Experience with GPU-based cloud instances for AI inference

- Familiarity with AI/ML frameworks (PyTorch, TensorFlow, Hugging Face, LangChain)

- Knowledge of vector databases (Pinecone, Weaviate, Qdrant)

- Experience with monitoring and observability tools (Datadog, Grafana, Prometheus)

- Understanding of AI API providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, Cohere) and how to integrate them into backend systems

title: Customer Success & Scheduling Coordinator (Field Team Support + Sales)
description:
???? Want to lead from behind the scenes at one of the top-rated home service companies in OKC?



We’re Shine of OKC — a premium window cleaning, gutter cleaning, and exterior services company serving homeowners with excellence. We’re looking for a full-time Customer Success & Team Coordinator to help keep our daily operations running smoothly, support our field team, and provide “wow” experiences for every customer.



If you love organizing fast-moving teams, serving customers with care, and keeping things on track — all while helping a growing business thrive — this could be your perfect role.



What You'll Do:

Answer inbound customer calls with warmth and professionalism

Schedule appointments, send quotes, and follow up to close jobs

Make outbound calls and send text messages to past and potential customers to offer services, confirm details, and build relationships

Provide daily support to our field technicians — assigning jobs, routing efficiently, and keeping the team informed

Monitor job progress, handle schedule changes, and resolve issues as they arise

Ensure invoices are completed accurately and payments are tracked and collected on time

Keep customer records updated in our CRM and help maintain a smooth daily workflow

Maintain a calm, clear, and upbeat presence under pressure

What Success Looks Like in This Role:

Customers feel cared for from the first call to the final follow-up

The schedule stays full, accurate, and efficient

The field team is confident, informed, and on time

Sales opportunities are followed up quickly and professionally

All invoices are completed promptly and payments are properly tracked and collected

You help create a smooth, organized, and encouraging environment for the entire team

What We’re Looking For:

Experience in the home service industry (window cleaning, HVAC, lawn care, pest control, etc.)

Strong background in customer service, scheduling, and phone/text-based sales

Familiarity with invoicing, billing, and basic payment tracking

Excellent spoken and written English — clear, confident, and friendly

Leadership mindset — someone who can support and guide others

Highly organized, tech-savvy, and calm under pressure

A reliable home office setup with strong internet and a backup power source

Available to work Monday–Friday, 10:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. Central Time (U.S.)

Why Join Shine?

We’re a values-driven company built on kindness, excellence, and doing what’s right. We believe in taking care of people — both our customers and our team. We’re growing quickly and looking for someone who wants to grow with us for the long haul.



If you're looking for more than just a job — if you're looking for a place where your skills matter and your work makes a difference — Shine could be your next home.



To Apply:

Please submit a 3–5 minute video introducing yourself and sharing:



Why you’re interested in this role

Your experience with customer support, scheduling, sales, and team leadership

What makes you a great fit for Shine

We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Project Manager | Low Voltage Security Systems
description:
SynergizeX Inc. is seeking an experienced Project Manager to oversee multiple low-voltage security installation projects throughout North America. This role is ideal for a highly organized, solutions-oriented professional who thrives in fast-paced construction environments and can confidently manage field operations, subcontractors, and client communication from kickoff to closeout.



You will play a key role in ensuring projects are delivered on time, within scope, and with strong documentation discipline.



Key Responsibilities:

• Develop and maintain detailed project schedules, task plans, and weekly execution priorities

• Coordinate technicians and subcontractors, including dispatching, daily check-ins, and progress tracking

• Monitor scope, site constraints, and trade dependencies to prevent delays

• Manage RFIs, site inquiries, and change order inputs in a structured and timely manner

• Lead client communications, meeting documentation, and action item follow-up

• Maintain accurate project documentation, status reports, and closeout packages

• Track labor targets, deliverables, and milestone performance

• Identify risks early and recommend practical, field-ready solutions



Project Types:

• Access control system installations

• Video surveillance (CCTV) deployments

• Structured cabling and pathway coordination

• Construction site coordination and project closeout support



What Success Looks Like:

• Clear, consistent weekly reporting to clients and internal teams

• Field teams arrive prepared, informed, and equipped

• Issues are documented, tracked, and resolved proactively

• Projects close cleanly with complete documentation and minimal punch list items



Qualifications:

• 3+ years of project management experience in construction, low voltage, or security systems

• Proven ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously

• Strong scheduling, coordination, and prioritization skills

• Confident written and verbal communication

• Ability to read drawings, interpret scopes, device lists, and floor plans

• Excellent organizational and documentation habits

• Reliable internet connection and professional remote workspace



Preferred Experience:

• Background in access control, CCTV, intrusion, intercom, or structured cabling

• Familiarity with tools such as Google Workspace, Excel, Smartsheet, Monday, Asana, or MS Project

• Experience coordinating subcontractors and multi-trade job sites



Work Schedule:

• Full-time position with required overlap during Eastern Time business hours

• Occasional early morning or late-day calls may be required for site coordination





If you are proactive, detail-oriented, and comfortable managing technical installation projects in a construction-driven environment, we encourage you to apply and join our growing team at SynergizeX Inc.

title: HR Virtual Assistant / Interview Coordinator
description:
Company: Core Mind Technology  

Role: HR Virtual Assistant / Interview Coordinator  

Employment Type: Full-Time  

Work Setup: Remote  

Schedule: Schedule: 9/10pm - 6/7am PST (8am - 5pm Central Time USA) {Daylight Savings Shifts the schedule 2 times per year}





About Core Mind Technology



Core Mind Technology builds AI-powered automation and digital service solutions, with a strong focus on clear systems, high-quality talent, and scalable operations. We are growing and need a HR Virtual Assistant / Interview Coordinator who can own day-to-day recruiting and HR coordination so leadership can focus on strategy and delivery.



This is a systems-driven HR role where you will help design and maintain structured hiring and onboarding workflows—not just post jobs and send
s.



About the Role



You will manage candidate pipelines, run structured initial interviews, coordinate with hiring managers, and help build HR processes that are consistent and data-informed. You’ll be responsible for ensuring that candidates have a smooth experience and that our internal team always knows exactly where each candidate is in the process.



You will work closely with leadership and collaborate with different divisions (AI automation, digital services, and internal operations) as we continue to grow our team.



Key Responsibilities



You will be responsible for:

- Posting and updating job listings on OnlineJobs.ph and other platforms  

- Sourcing and shortlisting candidates based on clear role scorecards and criteria  

- Reviewing resumes and screening answers for fit and red flags  

- Conducting 15–20 minute initial screening interviews via Zoom/Google Meet using our scripts  

- Taking structured notes and scoring candidates against predefined scorecards  

- Coordinating interviews with hiring managers and internal stakeholders  

- Managing calendars, sending invites, and following up with reminders  

- Keeping an organized candidate pipeline in our tracking system (ATS/Sheets/Notion)  

- Sending timely updates to candidates (next steps, rejections, follow-ups) using templates  

- Assisting with offer coordination and pre-onboarding communication  

- Supporting onboarding checklists: document collection, first-day schedule, system access coordination  

- Helping maintain and improve HR SOPs, templates, and internal hiring documentation  



Tools & Workflow



You may work with tools such as:



- Google Workspace (Docs, Sheets, Calendar, Gmail)  

- Zoom / Google Meet  

- Scheduling tools (e.g., Calendly or similar)  

- Internal tracking tools (Notion, Airtable, or spreadsheets)  

- Slack (or similar) for internal communication  

- Applicant tracking / HR dashboards as we implement them  



We value people who can follow existing SOPs and also propose workflow improvements as they learn the systems.



What We’re Looking For



We’re looking for someone who:



- Has 2+ years of experience in HR, recruitment, or as a VA handling hiring/interview coordination  

- Is confident speaking with candidates on calls and video, and represents the company well  

- Has excellent written and spoken English  

- Is highly detail-oriented, consistent, and process-driven  

- Can manage multiple roles and candidates in parallel without dropping details  

- Is organized, deadline-driven, and comfortable working with minimal micromanagement  

- Communicates clearly and professionally in remote, asynchronous environments  

- Is comfortable working with US-based businesses and time zones  



Nice to Have



- Experience hiring for remote roles in tech, digital services, or startups  

- Experience using an ATS or structured recruitment tracking tools  

- Familiarity with basic HR concepts (onboarding, probation, simple policies)  



Compensation (PECP-style Model)



We use a performance- and completion-aware structure similar in spirit to PECP:

- Competitive monthly salary ranging from $400 to $700 in PHP, aligned with experience and capability  

- Payout on a regular, predictable schedule  

- Performance-based bonuses available based on:

  - Speed and quality of hiring pipeline management  

  - Candidate experience and communication quality  

  - Accuracy, organization, and completeness of records  

  - Process improvements and documentation you introduce  



High performers may be eligible for:



- Compensation increases  

- Expanded HR responsibilities (policy support, people operations projects)  

- A long-term People Operations / HR leadership growth track within Core Mind Technology  





Benefits



- Long-term, stable remote role with US hours  

- Close collaboration with leadership and visibility into multiple business units  



Additional Benefits After 90 Days



Upon successfully completing a 90-day probation period and meeting performance expectations, Core Mind Technology will provide:



- A MacBook for work use, funded by the company  

- A battery backup / UPS system to help during power interruptions  

- High-speed internet funded by the company (either direct payment or a fixed monthly allowance)  

- Healthcare coverage, with details discussed during the interview and confirmed in your contract  





Ideal For



This role is ideal for:



- Experienced HR/recruitment virtual assistants  

- Coordinators who enjoy structured processes and clear documentation  

- Remote professionals who love organizing people, information, and schedules  

- Individuals looking for a long-term, growth-oriented position in a tech-forward company  





How to Apply



Please send:

- Your resume  

- A short summary (3–6 sentences) of your HR / recruitment / VA experience 

- The tools you’ve used for scheduling, interviewing, and tracking candidates  

- One example of a hiring or interview coordination workflow you’ve managed (what tools you used, number of candidates, and how you kept things organized)  



Optional but appreciated:



- A 1–2 minute voice or video introduction (link) sharing your background and why you’re a fit for this role  



Use the
 subject line:  

“HR Virtual Assistant / Interview Coordinator – Core Mind Technology – [Your Full Name]”



If you tell me whether you prefer to pay hourly or monthly and your exact target range, I can quickly adjust the compensation section to match your final offer.



Sources

title: Project Scheduler & Subcontractor Coordinator | Low Voltage Security
description:
SynergizeX Inc. is seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented Project Scheduler & Subcontractor Coordinator to support multiple low-voltage security projects across North America.



This role is ideal for someone with strong hands-on experience building and managing Gantt charts, coordinating multi-site construction schedules, and maintaining clear, proactive communication with field teams, subcontractors, and internal stakeholders.



You will be responsible for maintaining accurate project timelines, aligning field resources, recruiting and coordinating subcontractors, and ensuring smooth execution across active job sites.



Key Responsibilities:

• Scheduling & Planning

• Build and maintain detailed Gantt charts for multiple concurrent projects

• Develop baseline schedules and update progress weekly

• Track milestones, dependencies, labor allocation, and critical paths

• Adjust schedules based on field updates, material delays, or scope changes

• Identify risks to timelines and escalate issues proactively



Site & Field Coordination:

• Coordinate technicians and subcontractors across multiple job sites

• Align installation schedules with site access, material delivery, and trade sequencing

• Maintain consistent communication with site contacts and internal teams

• Ensure field crews are informed of scope, constraints, and priorities

• Track completion status and confirm closeout readiness



Subcontractor Recruitment & Management:

• Source and recruit qualified low-voltage subcontractors across North America

• Pre-qualify subcontractors based on technical capability, licensing, and project experience

• Maintain an organized database of vetted subcontractors

• Coordinate onboarding documentation and compliance requirements

• Align subcontractor availability with active and upcoming project schedules



Communication & Reporting:

• Provide structured weekly schedule updates to leadership and project teams

• Maintain organized documentation of schedule revisions and site updates

• Track open items, action steps, and resource conflicts

• Communicate schedule impacts clearly and professionally



What Success Looks Like:

• Clean, accurate Gantt charts with clearly defined milestones and dependencies

• Field teams and subcontractors deployed efficiently with minimal scheduling conflicts

• Subcontractor capacity aligned with project demand

• Clear communication between internal teams, subcontractors, and clients

• Projects move forward without preventable delays caused by coordination gaps



Required Qualifications:

• 3+ years of experience in project scheduling, construction coordination, or low-voltage/security environments

• Strong hands-on experience creating and managing Gantt charts

• Experience coordinating multiple job sites and trade schedules

• Confident written and verbal communication skills

• Ability to manage shifting priorities and time-sensitive coordination

• Strong organizational discipline and documentation habits

• Proficiency in tools such as Smartsheet, MS Project, Monday, Asana, or similar scheduling platforms

• Reliable internet and professional remote workspace



Preferred Experience:

• Experience in access control, CCTV, structured cabling, or low-voltage installation environments

• Experience recruiting and managing subcontractor networks

• Ability to read construction drawings and interpret scope documents

• Experience supporting multi-state or multi-province field operations



Work Schedule:

• Full-time position with required overlap during Eastern Time business hours

• Occasional early or late calls may be required for site coordination



If you are schedule-driven, detail-focused, and comfortable coordinating subcontractors and field operations in a fast-paced construction environment, we encourage you to apply and join SynergizeX Inc.

title: YouTube SEO & Thumbnail Specialist
description:
YouTube SEO & Thumbnail Specialist



Brand: Everybody’s Coach Erik Robinson

Location: Remote (Philippines Preferred)

Type: Part-Time | Ongoing Role

Schedule: Monday–Thursday (supporting 2 daily livestreams)



?



???? About the Brand



Everybody’s Coach Erik Robinson is a leadership and sales performance brand focused on:

 • Building high-performance sales teams

 • Entrepreneurship and mindset development

 • Financial literacy and wealth building

 • Motivational training for life insurance agents and sales professionals



We produce 2 live streams daily (Monday–Thursday) and are scaling our YouTube presence aggressively.



We are looking for a high-level YouTube SEO & Thumbnail Specialist who understands how to turn content into discoverable, clickable assets.



?



???? Role Overview



You will be responsible for:

 1. Optimizing YouTube titles for SEO and click-through

 2. Writing compelling, keyword-rich descriptions

 3. Conducting YouTube keyword research

 4. Creating high-converting thumbnails

 5. Upload optimization and tagging

 6. Monitoring analytics and improving CTR and retention



This is not a beginner position. We want someone who understands YouTube growth strategy.



?



???? Responsibilities



1?? SEO & Keyword Research

 • Research keywords using TubeBuddy, VidIQ, or similar tools

 • Identify high-ranking search opportunities in:

 • Sales training

 • Entrepreneurship

 • Financial services

 • Life insurance recruiting

 • Leadership development

 • Suggest SEO-driven titles before upload



?



2?? Description Writing

 • Write compelling 250–500 word SEO descriptions

 • Include:

 • Primary keyword focus

 • Secondary keywords

 • Timestamps (if provided)

 • Clear call-to-action (subscribe, book call, etc.)

 • Optimize for search AND engagement



?



3?? Thumbnail Creation

 • Design 2 thumbnails daily (Monday–Thursday)

 • Style must be:

 • Bold

 • Clean

 • Professional

 • High-contrast

 • Text minimal but powerful

 • Understand psychological triggers:

 • Curiosity

 • Urgency

 • Authority

 • Income potential

 • Ability to match brand tone (motivational, high-performance, premium)



?



4?? Upload Optimization

 • Add tags strategically

 • Optimize playlist placement

 • Ensure proper formatting and SEO structure



?



5?? Analytics Tracking

 • Monitor:

 • Click-through rate

 • Average view duration

 • Watch time

 • Provide weekly performance summary

 • Suggest improvements based on data



?



? Requirements

 • Proven experience growing YouTube channels

 • Strong understanding of YouTube SEO

 • Thumbnail portfolio required

 • Fluent English writing skills

 • Experience with:

 • Canva or Photoshop

 • TubeBuddy / VidIQ

 • YouTube Studio analytics

 • Reliable internet connection

 • Available during U.S. Eastern Time support hours



?



???? Compensation

 • Competitive monthly retainer (based on experience)

 • Performance bonuses based on growth metrics

 • Long-term growth opportunity

title: Google Ads- Home Service Business
description:
Are you highly experienced in managing Google Ads and Local Service Ads for home service businesses?

We are a window cleaning, gutter cleaning, and exterior cleaning company based in the Oklahoma City metro. We are not an agency. We are a growing service business and every advertising dollar matters.

We are looking for someone sharp, disciplined, and detail oriented to manage and optimize our Google PPC and LSA accounts.

We are not looking for a set it and forget it manager.

We need someone who understands how to:

• Lower cost per booked job

• Improve lead quality by targeting better zip codes and neighborhoods

• Optimize search terms weekly

• Build and maintain strong negative keyword lists

• Allocate budget properly between PPC and LSA

• Aggressively dispute bad LSA leads

• Track performance based on real booked jobs, not vanity metrics

We do not have access to modify our website, so your focus will strictly be Google Ads and LSA optimization. Most of our conversions happen by phone, so you must be comfortable optimizing campaigns based on call data and booked job numbers that we provide.

Our goal is not volume at any cost. Our goal is profitable, high quality leads in strong neighborhoods.

This is a long term, part time position. We are looking for someone who treats ad spend like it is their own money.

Please send:

A short 3–5 minute video introducing yourself

Specific examples of home service accounts you have managed

Results you achieved in lowering cost per lead or cost per booked job

Your proposed monthly management fee

How many hours per week you believe are necessary to properly manage a local service campaign with a $1,500–$1,750 monthly ad budget

If you are a set it and forget it type of manager, this will not be a good fit.

We are looking for someone who wants a long term relationship and takes pride in disciplined optimization.

title: YT Shorts Editor (FAST TURNAROUND)
description:

Excuses and being lazy DOES NOT work with us. We are looking for sharp editors looking to grow into different positions including short form, long form YT and more. 



If you don't do work thoroughly, can't think for yourself, and can't deliver in a timely manner. DO NOT EVEN THINK about applying. 



Here is exactly what you will do: 



1) Receive a full script of all of the ads we wrote 

2) Receive google drive folder of every hook, body, and call to action in video format (mp4 or mov)

3) Edit all ads with fast paced, dynamic editing styles, and VERY HIGH QUALITY animations. 



You will be editing 10-30 new short-style ads per week or more. 



I need someone sharp, not lazy, and studies engagement to the tee. It should include creativity, logos, and dynamic cuts. 



Please include YOUR best work in a google drive. We will schedule a 10 minute interview and get going from there.

title: AI Video Editor Facebook Ads
description:
Hello Future Employee,



Who are we?

We are a fast-growing e-commerce company operating Shopify brand stores across Europe, generating consistent 6-figure monthly revenue. We specialize in emotionally-driven direct response advertising.



We are hiring an AI Video Editor to produce AI video ads for our brand. The right candidate will have a sharp eye for realism, understand what makes an AI generator feel authentic (not staged), and be eager to learn our specific creative frameworks. You will be trained directly by the founder on our proven systems.



Responsibilities:



Generate high-quality AI Videos for direct response marketing

Follow brand guidelines and creative briefs to produce realistic, AI videos

Iterate quickly based on feedback to refine concepts

Organize and manage image assets for the creative team





You are the perfect fit if you have these qualities:

Strong visual eye for what looks "real" vs. "staged"

Detail-oriented and able to follow specific creative direction

To apply, please include:



Example(s) of AI videos you have created

Best Regards,

ASG

title: WordPress & Shopify Store Developer
description:
Arispheris is looking for a highly skilled Website Developer to join our team for a 3-month full-time project term, with potential for extension. This is a remote position, but we require a designer who can work independently, take initiative, and bring fresh, original creativity to the table—no AI-generated websites will be accepted.



If you thrive in an environment that values creative autonomy, attention to detail, and hands-on design skills, we’d love to hear from you.



Company Overview

Arispheris is a staffing firm that provides authentic and connective staffing solutions for small business owners. We take pride in our in-depth recruiting process, ensuring that every professional we bring on board has the skills and drive to succeed.



We are actively expanding our design team and are looking for a Website Developer who excels at crafting fast and SEO ready websites to support clients in reaching their target audiences to increase revenue and website traffic. If you want to be part of a team that values true creative expertise, this is the perfect opportunity for you!



Requirements & Qualifications

Bachelor's degree in Web development or related field, or relevant experience.

Minimum of 2 years of professional experience in website design and coding.

Website and software application designing, building, or maintaining, without AI.

Using scripting or authoring languages, management tools, content creation tools, applications, and digital media.

Conferring with teams to resolve conflicts, prioritize needs, develop content criteria, or choose solutions.

Directing or performing Website updates.

Developing or validating test routines and schedules to ensure that test cases mimic external interfaces and address all browser and device types.

Editing, writing, or designing Website content, and directing tea
mbers who produce content.

Maintaining an understanding of the latest Web applications and programming practices through education, study, and training. 

Back up files from Web sites to local directories for recovery.

Create daily logs of tasks completed for company and client reference.

Identifying problems uncovered by customer feedback and testing, and correcting or referring problems to appropriate personnel for correction.

Evaluating code to ensure it meets industry standards, is valid, is properly structured, and is compatible with browsers, devices, or operating systems.

Determining user needs by analyzing technical requirements.

Must be highly proficient in both WordPress, their respective plugins, & Shopify—you will be tested during the interview.

Strong sense of design composition.

Ability to create websites quickly and efficiently while maintaining a high standard of design quality.

Excellent communication skills and ability to work collaboratively with clients and teams.

Detail-oriented and capable of handling multiple projects at once while meeting deadlines.

Familiarity with tools like Google Workspace, Slack, and Asana is a plus.

Absolutely no AI-generated designs, portfolios, and websites will be considered.



Software & Platform Requirements:

Expertise in WordPress, Shopify and Elementor

Solid understanding of UX/UI principles

Proficiency in HTML and Python coding

Experience with affiliate marketing strategies

Proficiency with Shopify e-commerce platforms



Compensation & Benefits

Full-time remote position (3-month term, potential for extension based on performance)

Competitive compensation based on experience and skills

Bi-monthly pay via money transfer

Paid career training relevant to the role (should you be hired for longer than nine months) 

Performance-based bonuses (available for long-term staff)

Work-life balance and flexible hours



As part of our team, you'll interact closely with clients, forming strong partnerships. You'll use your excellent communication skills to understand, negotiate, and ultimately create tailored solutions that exceed expectations. Does the idea of such meaningful client engagement unnerve you? If not, then you're ready to contribute to our shared vision. Here are the next steps to move forward.



***Very Important***

How to Apply

We will be holding interviews on Wednesday, Friday, and Saturday this week for immediate hiring contingent on your skills, your interview task performance and company fit.



To Apply, Follow These Steps:

Reply with your Name and Position in the subject line. Example: "John Doe – WordPress & Shopify Store Developer"

Define a "backend developer staging area" in WordPress/ CPanel (this is part of your application process).



Submit the following in your response
:

Your resume (CV)

Portfolio links showcasing your original design work (Absolutely NO AI-generated websites. Wordpress & Shopify Shops ONLY)

List links to Wordpress & Shopify Sites you have designed.

One employer reference



Candidates that do not submit the requested items will not be considered. 



Once we receive your application, we will send you a scheduler to book your interview slot. During your interview, you will be required to demonstrate proficiency in Wordpress, Developer Backend, and Shopify Shop Setup.



If you’re ready to bring your creativity to a team that values real site developer expertise, we look forward to your application!

title: SEO Specialist/Campaign Manager
description:
Must have 5+ prior years of SEO experience and campaign management. Experience managing 10+ clients, local SEO and small business Google ads campaigns. Experience managing a small team of workers (2-4 people) preferred. 





Must be able to clearly understand directions and follow written directions exactly how described. Must be very detail oriented clearly speak and understand English and follow established operating procedures. Should be comfortable with reviewing and fine tuning SEO tasks within campaigns. Oversee the work of 1-2 SEO specialists.

- Google Sheets

- Wordpress& Other CMS Systems

- Wordpress Plugins

- Google Sites

- Go Daddy Hosting/Siteground and other hosting plans

- Other Google Properties

MUST have Working knowledge using the following tools

This is a remote, virtual position. We are looking for a professional person who is looking to grow with our company over the long term. There is opportunity for further growth and development with the right candidate. Looking for candidate to manage and oversee the work of 2 SEO specialists. This is senior position and previous experience managing a team is important and will be considered.  



Must have good internet connection 30+ Mbps!

title: Real Estate Cold Caller (Work From Home | Long-Term Position)
description:
We are a growing U.S.-based real estate investment company looking for a reliable and motivated Cold Calling Virtual Assistant to join our team long-term.



Your main responsibility will be calling homeowners in the United States to identify individuals who may be interested in selling their property.



We are looking for someone who is confident speaking with people, dependable, and comfortable making outbound calls daily.



This is a stable, long-term work-from-home opportunity for the right candidate.



Responsibilities:

- Make outbound calls to property owners using our dialing system

- Speak with homeowners professionally

- Identify motivated property sellers

- Collect basic property information

- Enter lead details into our CRM

- Transfer qualified leads to our acquisitions team

- Maintain consistent daily calling activity



Requirements:

- Clear and understandable English

- Neutral or easy-to-understand accent

- Previous cold calling or sales experience preferred

- Reliable high-speed internet connection

- Laptop or desktop computer

- Noise-canceling headset

- Comfortable making high-volume outbound calls



Compensation:

$4–$6 USD per hour (based on experience and performance)

Weekly pay

Performance bonus opportunities available

Long-term employment opportunity



Work Schedule:

- 40 hours per week preferred

- Must be available during U.S. calling hours



To Apply:



Please include the following:



1. Resume

2. Description of your cold calling experience

3. Computer and headset specifications

4. Short voice recording introducing yourself as if calling a homeowner
